contactInfo.title: Get in Touch
contactInfo.summary: I am currently looking for a new role and I am open for a wide range of opportunities. I am a person with a strong self-motivation and ability to quickly grasp new concepts. I have high sense of integrity, honesty and commitment to quality work. I have confidence in independently acquiring new programming languages and technologies as required by the job. Please do feel free to check out my online profiles below and get in touch.
